page.title: 18Women's Jobs in Newquay
page.content:
{(Refer to Page 14 for background)
We asked the mothers to say what they did as a job.We have to generalise due to lack of space. {Housewife........................40% {Hotelier/Landlady/'B&B'..........11% {Shop Assistant...................10% {Secretary/Receptionist/Typist.....5% {Cleaner/Chambermaid/Homehelp......5% {Waitress..........................4% {Nurse/Health Visitor/Therapist....4% {Teacher...........................3% {Pharmacist/Doctor/Physiotherapist.2% {Running OAP Home..................2% {Hairdresser.......................2% {Baker/Cook/Cafe Proprieter........2% {Barmaid...........................2% {Shopkeeper........................1% We also had an Adult Education Principle,an Author,two Artists and a Potter,an Estate Agent and a Milliner.
